mapper.select:
select maker, model, imgUrl, type, pixel, cmos, sensor, imageProcessor, screen, viewFinder, maxISO, shutterSpeed, continuousShooting, af, focusArea, flash, videoQuality, volume, weight, etc from modelDetail where UPPER(REPLACE(model, ' ', '')) IN
UPPER(REPLACE(#{item}, ' ', ''))
OR UPPER(REPLACE(maker||model, ' ', '')) IN
UPPER(REPLACE(#{item}, ' ', ''))
